excerpt: "Carnegie Learning is proud to announce that MATHia®, its powerful adaptive learning math software, has won “Best Artificial Intelligence Solution” in The EdTech Awards 2020. MATHia uses artificial intelligence and cognitive science to mirror a human tutor with more complexity and precision than any other math software."
